fullContent: Home› DriftDrift HuntersBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenDrift Hunters is a thrilling drift game where you will get into the driver's seat of the best vehicle brands and set for a ride. You have two types of game map options: Tracks and Playgrounds. Decide which map you want to drive on and run your beloved car in one of the best driving games!How to Play Drift HuntersSelect your car from the Cars section and choose your racetrack from the Race menu to start.In the beginning, you only have access to a car similar to Toyota AE86.As you perform drifts and earn money equal to your scores, you will be able to unlock new cars. You have 26 vehicle options.You also have 10 spectacular game maps to drive on. Make your choices and hit the road!Cars MenuThe drift game offers you cars inspired by many well-known brands. We recommend that you unlock each of them and experience their drives. Each has unique features, from engine power to brakes. See your options from the Cars section with the key icon. These cars are familiar to you from the famous movie series The Fast and The Furious! Now, we are offering you to get behind the wheels of them.Toyota Trueno GT-Apex (Cost: Free)Datsun 240Z (Cost: 8500 CR)Nissan 240SX (Cost: 10500 CR)BMW M3 E30 (Cost: 12800 CR)Mitsubishi Evolution (Cost: 14700 CR)Subaru Impreza WRX (Cost: 15100 CR)BMW M3 E36 (Cost: 17500 CR)Nissan Silvia 240SX (Cost: 19800 CR)Nissan Silvia S15 (Cost: 24200 CR)Honda S2000 (Cost: 25500 CR)Mazda RX7 (Cost: 29400 CR)BMW M3 E46 (Cost: 32100 CR)Toyota GT86 (Cost: 33500 CR)Toyota Supra (Cost: 40200 CR)BMW 1M Coupé E82 (Cost: 46000 CR)Infiniti G35 Coupé (Cost: 52000 CR)Mercedes Benz AMG CLA C45 (Cost: 63300 CR)Ford Fiesta ST (Cost: 71600 CR)Nissan 370Z (Cost: 84300 CR)Nissan Skyline GTR R34 (Cost: 90100 CR)Lexus GS (Cost: 95700 CR)Dodge Challenger Hellcat (Cost: 99400 CR)Ford Mustang (Cost: 102300 CR)BMW 335i F30 (Cost: 116700 CR)Nissan GTR (Cost: 128400 CR)Porsche 911 (Cost: 134300 CR)Wall Tap GlitchIf you'd like to hack Drift Hunters and earn cash faster, you can use a glitch in Wall Tap bonuses. Please follow the steps mentioned below:Select the Honda S2000 specified in the picture.Adjust the tuning settings exactly as shown in the picture.Navigate to the city map and drive beyond the city limits.Once you reach the edge of the map, start drifting, and you will earn a significant amount of wall tap bonuses randomly.Strengthen the PerformanceThe Parts section is there for you to enhance your car's performance levels. Your vehicle has stock-level performance regarding the brakes, weight, gearbox, turbo, and engine powers. But you have the option to strengthen its power from stock-level to pro. In addition, you have the chance to adjust the settings of your car's physical appearance, such as cambers, heights, and offsets. View the Tuning section from the menu to modify.Tuning the DetailsGive your car a style by giving it a body color and choosing the rims. The glossy, metallic, matte and chrome color options await you to pick. You are the designer of your vehicle here. Read our full drifting guide to learn what is the best tuning settings and how to master Drift Hunters and Drift Hunters 2.Manual or Automatic: Select Your GearboxYou can change the gearbox type of your vehicle in the Drift Hunters. From the main menu, click on the Options section. Make your adjustments according to your wishes. You have the automatic and manual gearbox types. You can also set the graphics quality in this section.ControlsWASD / Arrow Keys: MoveSpacebar: BrakeC: Camera ViewLeft Shift: Gear UpLeft Ctrl: Gear DownDeveloperDrift Hunters was developed by Ilya Kaminetsky.Discover More GamesIf you enjoy playing Drift Hunters, you may also like City Stunts. You are free to fly in the air with the most elegant sports cars in the game. Use the high ramps and perform stunts.
